Dark Shackles.Name: Dark Shackles
Dark Shackles.Description: Enemy loses 9 (15) Strength this turn. Exhaust.

Deep Breath.Name: Deep Breath
Deep Breath.Description: Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile. Draw 1 card.
Deep Breath.Description (Upgraded): Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile. Draw 2 cards.

Discovery.Name: Discovery
Discovery.Description: Choose 1 of 3 random cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.
Discovery.Description (Upgraded): Choose 1 of 3 random cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

Dramatic Entrance.Name: Dramatic Entrance
Dramatic Entrance.Description: Innate. Deal 8 (12) damage to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

Enlightenment.Name: Enlightenment
Enlightenment.Description: Reduce the cost of all cards in your hand to 1 this turn.
Enlightenment.Description (Upgraded): Reduce the cost of all cards in your hand to 1 this combat.

Forethought.Name: Forethought
Forethought.Description: Put a card from your hand to the bottom of your draw pile. It costs 0 until played.
Forethought.Description (Upgraded): Put any number of cards from your hand to the bottom of your draw pile. They cost 0 until played.

Impatience.Name: Impatience
Impatience.Description: If you have no Attacks in your hand, draw 2 (3) cards.

Jack of All Trades.Name: Jack of All Trades
Jack of All Trades.Description: Add 1 random Colorless card into your hand. Exhaust.
Jack of All Trades.Description (Upgraded): Add 2 random Colorless cards into your hand. Exhaust.

Madness.Name: Madness
Madness.Description: Reduce the cost of a random card in your hand to 0 this combat. Exhaust.

Mind Blast.Name: Mind Blast
Mind Blast.Description: Innate. Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your draw pile.

Panic Button.Name: Panic Button
Panic Button.Description: Gain 30 (40) Block. You cannot gain Block from cards for 2 turns. Exhaust.

Purity.Name: Purity
Purity.Description: Exhaust up to 3 (5) cards in your hand. Exhaust.

Apotheosis.Name: Apotheosis
Apotheosis.Description: Upgrade ALL your cards for the rest of combat. Exhaust.

Chrysalis.Name: Chrysalis
Chrysalis.Description: Shuffle 3 (5) random Skills into your draw pile. They cost 0 this combat. Exhaust.

Hand of Greed.Name: Hand of Greed
Hand of Greed.Description: Deal 20 (25) damage. If Fatal, gain 20 (25) Gold.

Magnetism.Name: Magnetism
Magnetism.Description: At the start of your turn, add a random Colorless card into your hand.

Mayhem.Name: Mayhem
Mayhem.Description: At the start of your turn, play the top card of your draw pile.

Metamorphosis.Name: Metamorphosis
Metamorphosis.Description: Shuffle 3 (5) random Attacks into your draw pile. They cost 0 this combat. Exhaust.

Panache.Name: Panache
Panache.Description: Every time you play 5 cards in a single turn, deal 10 (14) damage to ALL enemies.

Sadistic Nature.Name: Sadistic Nature
Sadistic Nature.Description: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, they take 5 (7) damage.

Secret Technique.Name: Secret Technique
Secret Technique.Description: Put a Skill from your draw pile into your hand. Exhaust.
Secret Technique.Description (Upgraded): Put a Skill from your draw pile into your hand.

Secret Weapon.Name: Secret Weapon
Secret Weapon.Description: Put an Attack from your draw pile into your hand. Exhaust.
Secret Weapon.Description (Upgraded): Put an Attack from your draw pile into your hand.

The Bomb.Name: The Bomb
The Bomb.Description: At the end of 3 turns, deal 40 (50) damage to ALL enemies.

Thinking Ahead.Name: Thinking Ahead
Thinking Ahead.Description: Draw 2 cards. Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. Exhaust.
Thinking Ahead.Description (Upgraded): Draw 2 cards. Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile.

Transmutation.Name: Transmutation
Transmutation.Description: Add X random Colorless cards into your hand. They cost 0 this turn. Exhaust.
Transmutation.Description (Upgraded): Add X random Upgraded Colorless cards into your hand. They cost 0 this turn. Exhaust.

Violence.Name: Violence
Violence.Description: Put 3 (4) random Attacks from your draw pile into your hand. Exhaust.

Beta.Name: Beta
Beta.Description: Shuffle an Omega into your draw pile. Exhaust.

Omega.Name: Omega
Omega.Description: At the end of your turn, deal 50 (60) damage to ALL enemies.

Ritual Dagger.Name: Ritual Dagger
Ritual Dagger.Description: Deal 15 damage. If Fatal, permanently increase this card's damage by 3 (5). Exhaust.
